decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby approved shall be finished in a colour to match Goosewing Grey, Meadowland or Moorland Green, as indicated on the submitted colour coat specification sheet dated September 2014 produced by TATA Steel.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, Layout Plan 1:2,500, Layout Plan 1:1,250 and  Planning Statement dated July 2017 prepared by Savills received on 13/07/2017. DQ2679 rev E, Letter ref. SDHB/OPP1125660 dated 4th October 2017 prepared by Portakabin Group, colour coat specification sheet dated September 2014 produced by TATA Steel and letter dated 16th October 2017 prepared by Savills received on 16/10/2017 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Installation of a single storey portacabin security unit
